contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=February 2013}} [[Image:Roger Bonvin.gif|right]] '''Roger Bonvin''' (12 September 1907, [[Icogne]], [[Valais]] - 5 June 1982) was a [[Switzerland|Swiss]] politician and [[member of the Swiss Federal Council]] for the Canton of [[Valais]] (1962-1973). He was elected to the [[Federal Council of Switzerland]] on 27 September 1962 and handed over office on 31 December 1973. He was affiliated to the [[Christian Democratic People's Party of Switzerland]]. During his office time he held the following departments: * [[Department of Finance (Switzerland)|Department of Finance]] (1962 - 1968) * [[Federal Department of Environment, Transport, Energy and Communications|Department of Transport, Communications and Energy]] (1968 - 1973) He was [[President of the Confederation (Switzerland)|President of the Confederation]] twice, in 1967 and 1973. ==External links== *{{Dodis|P12130}} *{{HDS|4723}} *{{Swiss Federal Councillor|82}} {{start box}} {{succession box | before = [[Jean Bourgknecht]] | title = [[Member of the Swiss Federal Council]] | years = 1962–1973 | after = [[Hans HÃ¼rlimann]]}} {{end box}} {{Swiss Presidents}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Bonvin, Roger | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 12 September 1907 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 5 June 1982 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bonvin, Roger}} [[Category:1907 births]] [[Category:1982 deaths]] [[Category:People from Sierre District]] [[Category:Christian Democratic People's Party of Switzerland politicians]] [[Category:Members of the Swiss Federal Council]] [[Category:Swiss Roman Catholics]] {{Switzerland-politician-stub}}
